entities.description: Experience of vomiting or nausea as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Experience of muscle cramps or aches as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Experience of teary eyes or runny nose as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Feeling sweaty, having enlarged pupils, or having hair standing up as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Experience of diarrhea as a symptom of heroin withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Indicates that the respondent has never used heroin.
Indicates whether the respondent used heroin in the past 12 months.
